settings.content: It is possible to make breaking changes to your store here. Do not edit these settings unless you're absolutely sure of what you're doing!
The primary store is the one that users anywhere will see by default.

settings.label: Primary Domain
settings.info: Enter the domain of the primary store (Do NOT include www or http:// or https://)

settings.label: Primary Hash Code
settings.info: The hash code can be entered at the end of a URL to override the Geo IP redirect (ex. mystore.com/#us)

settings.label: Primary Language Code
settings.info: Enter the language code for this store, to be used by the canonical/alternate meta tags (ex. en-us)

settings.label: Whitelist URL Paths
settings.info: Enter a comma-separated list of url paths that should always use the primary store (ex. /apps/store-locator,/blogs)

settings.content: Alternate stores will only be visited by users from specific geographical locations.
Enter settings for an alternate store

settings.label: Store Domain
settings.info: Enter the domain of store (Do NOT include www or http:// or https://)

settings.label: Store Hash Code
settings.info: The hash code can be entered at the end of a URL to override the Geo IP redirect (ex. mystore.ca/#ca)

settings.label: Store Language Code
settings.info: Enter the language code for this store, to be used by the canonical/alternate meta tags (ex. en-ca)

settings.label: Store Country Codes
settings.info: Enter a comma-separated list of the country codes that should redirect to the store (example: CA)

settings.label: Enable Store Switcher
